Kennedy on November 22 , 1963 . + Lee Harvey Oswald + Following Kennedy 's assassination , Oswald was initially arrested for the murder of police officer J. D. Tippit , who was killed on a Dallas street about 45 minutes after Kennedy was shot . + Lee Harvey Oswald + Two days later , while being transferred from the city jail to the county jail , Oswald was fatally shot by Dallas nightclub owner Jack Ruby in full view of television cameras broadcasting live .
explanation_1: Lee Harvey Oswald was arrested for the assassination of President John F. Kennedy. He was later arrested for the murder of police officer J. D. Tippit.
